About Configuration Files

Serena ChangeMan Version Manager stores configuration options in two types of configuration files:

  • Master configuration file, which contains configuration options for a project database.
  • Project configuration file, which contains configuration options for a project. Individual projects do not require that a configuration file be associated with them; they can use the settings in the master configuration file.

Version Manager uses a configuration file if one is:

  • Associated with a project database or project. A configuration file associated with a project database is called a master configuration file.
  • Embedded into Version Manager.
